It is characterized by its delicate, translucent petals that appear to shimmer in the sunlight, giving it a ghostly appearance. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers that bloom only under specific environmental conditions, making it difficult to study. Despite its beauty, Pamplethantha remains a poorly understood species due to its elusive nature and limited distribution.
